query: select func_vqa("please name all the anatomical sites associated with diseases.", t1.study_id) from ( select tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 16526693 and admissions.dischtime is not null order by admissions.admittime desc limit 1 ) order by tb_cxr.studydatetime desc limit 1 ) ) as t1 union select func_vqa("please name all the anatomical sites associated with technical assessments.", t2.study_id) from ( select tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.study_id in ( select distinct tb_cxr.study_id from tb_cxr where tb_cxr.hadm_id in ( select admissions.hadm_id from admissions where admissions.subject_id = 16526693 and admissions.dischtime is not null order by admissions.admittime desc limit 1 ) order by tb_cxr.studydatetime desc limit 1 ) ) as t2
q_tag: given the [time_filter_exact1] study of patient {patient_id} [time_filter_global1], list all anatomical locations related to any ${category_1} or ${category_2}.
tag: given the [time_filter_exact1:exact-last] study of patient {patient_id} [time_filter_global1:rel-hosp-last], list all anatomical locations related to any disease or technicalassessment.
